definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut off, make inaccessible (esp. by fortifying), enclose (NH id., Aram. [[בְּחַר]], bs.ar (Pa. diminish, substract), perh. cf. Ar. bus.run side, edge, bis.run, etc., rough stone, 0’ard.un bas.irah;un land in wh. are sharp stones (cf. Lane))—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִבְחׂר]] Ps 76:13; 2 ms. [[תִּבְחׂר]] Le 25:5, De 24:21, [[וַיִּבְחְרוּ]] Ju Jdg 9:27, [[תִּבְחְרוּ]] Le 25:11; Pt. act. [[בּוֹחֵר]] Je 6:9, [[בּֽׂחְרִיס]] Je 49:9, Ob:Ob 5; pass. m. [[בָּחוּר]] Zec 11:2 Kt (Qr [[בָּחִיר]]), f. [[בְּחוּרָה]] Is 2:15 + 3 t. + Ez Eze 21:25 v. infr.; pl. f. [[בְּחוּרוֹת]] Ez Eze 36:35, [[בְּחֻרוֹת]] Nu 13:28 + 14 t., [[בְּחוּרׂת]] De 1:28, Ne 9:25, [[בְּחֻרׂת]] De 3:5, De 9:1; —cut off, grape-clusters, [[ענבים]] Le 25:5, cf. v:Le 25:11 (obj. [[נזיר]]), De 24:21, Ju Jdg 9:27 (obj. in both, [[כרם]]); hence Pt. act. grape-gathering, -gatherer Je 6:9, Je 49:9, Ob:Ob 5; fig. cut off (= take away) Ps 76:13 (obj. [[רות נגידים]]); most often Pt. pass. cut off, made inaccessible, De Is 2:15 = fortified, always f.; generally adj. c. [[עיר]], [[עריס]]; Nu 13:28, De 1:28, De 3:5, De 9:1, Jos 14:12, 2Sa 20:6, 2Ki 18:13 = Is 36:1, 2Ki 19:25 = Is 37:26, 2Ch 17:2, 2Ch 19:5, 2Ch 32:1, 2Ch 33:14, Ne 9:25, Is 25:2, Is 27:10, Ez Eze 36:35, Ho 8:14, Zep 1:16; rarely c. [[חומה]] De 28:52, Is 2:15, Je 15:20; ´[[יער הב]] Zec 11:2 (rd. Kt); once, subst. of secrets, mysteries (= unattainable things) Je 33:3; —´[[ב]] Ez Eze 21:25 LXX Sm Co [[בְּתוֹבָהּ]], doubtless right.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּבַצֵּר]] Je 51:53 fortify; so Inf. [[לְבַּחֵר]] Is 22:10.
